title: The new CM + Bugs/
body:
This is copy and paste from a support ticket I submitted, just letting everyone know.

"
 I have reached lvl 4 with some champion (Mainly braum)
But I do not have the Banner nor the emote, and Im about to reach lvl 5.

Bugs:
Azir- His ults are not knocking people away.
I.E- I had a lee sin Q (second) to me, as he landed, I pressed R.
Soldiers spawn behind me (In front of lee sin) and go through him and dont knock him away.
Same thing happened to me against a Katerina.

Lux-Skin (I think Iron legion lux)
Her E (Her AoE) is really, really hard to see.
and sometimes it doesn't show up at all, I could walk into a wave of minions and not notice the very hard to see E.
Or she could send it out of vision (In a brush) and I wouldn't see it. 
"

Riot member:

hisNameIsJickoy (Riot Games Player Support)
Gave me a reply, telling me to post here.

replies.body:
...

What?

Firstly, bug reports belong on the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board. Secondly, submitting a ticket is apparently meant to be the *preferred* alternative to reporting bugs, unless the bot handling your ticket isn't yet programmed to know how to actually interpret a bug report and forward it to a red.

As for the banner not appearing, that's most likely just from the whole implementation being bugged. Just wait it out and Riot will eventually fix it.

I was told to post it.
To this bored as well, the CM bug seems to have been fixed.
Now I just have to wait for the azir and lux bug to be fixed.
Does not explain that sticky they've got on the left column, then.
